title: GDG DevFest NYC 2016: Looking Back
brief: DevFestNYC 2016 was the inaugural developer conference for the new GDG NYC chapter. Let's recap.

title: GDG DevFest 2017: It's Happening!
brief: GDG NYC is proud to announce our 2nd annual 2-day developer conference, this time at Galvanize NYC!

title: AppFest Hackathon: Call For Participation!
brief: This year, DevFestNYC also features APPFEST - a 1-day Build-an-App hackathon featuring Firebase!

title: NodeBots Battle: Hour of Code @DevFestNYC
brief: Dec 4-10 is CSEdWeek, the start of the Hour Of Code. Get a headstart at DevFestNYC with NodeBots, Robotics & JavaScript!
